section.p: Information about the environment in which the patient is found

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11415 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.8"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67665-0" EMS Scene Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10732)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "EMS Scene" (CONF:10734)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11028)
Conforms to First Unit Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.84)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11032)
Conforms to Scene Patient Count (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.86)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11034)
Conforms to Mass Casualty Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.87)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11036)
Conforms to Location Type Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.88)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67665-0" EMS Scene Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10732)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "EMS Scene" (CONF:10734)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11028)
Conforms to First Unit Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.84)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11032)
Conforms to Scene Patient Count (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.86)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11034)
Conforms to Mass Casualty Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.87)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11036)
Conforms to Location Type Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.88)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.8"/> <code code="67665-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS Scene Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>EMS Scene</title> <text/> </section>
